article.title: SAIC Awarded $97 Million Army Delivery Order for Military Mobile VACIS(R) Inspection Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has received a delivery order from the U.S. Army valued at more than $97 million for Military Mobile VACIS(R) inspection systems plus associated maintenance services. The systems produce digital images of the contents of vehicles and cargo for analysis, enabling Army personnel to search for weapons, explosives and other threats.
